title: The Bangkok Boy
overview: After getting released from prison, Sun is filled with anger and sets up an underground gang, the Bangkok Boys. While he expands his power searching for the truth behind the tragic deaths of his nearest and dearest, he falls in love with Peach, a sensitive Korean artist, and unknowingly sets himself up on a path of love and hatred intertwined. A bloodthirsty and heartbreaking urban revenge love story is about to unfold in Bangkok.
